entry.title: Tuesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. A few rain showers or flurries beginning early this evening then changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening.
